title: MoviePedia
description: Moviepedia contains movie searches, pagination, and integrated videos. It features functions to add movies to favorites, rate them, and manage watchlists, all without requiring user authentication.

title: Worldwise
description: This is a web app where user can keep track of cities they have visited throughout the world. THe app uses React leaflet and other such 3rd party libraries to make it functional.

title: usePopcorn
description: This is a web app where user can keep track of cities they have visited throughout the world. THe app uses React leaflet and other such 3rd party libraries to make it functional.

title: forkify
description: Recipe application with custom recipe upload option. Created with HTML, SCSS and JavaScript. Used 'Parcel' as the package bundler.
